body.name: GasOne Premium Wood Burning Rocket Stove Camping for Backpacking, Hiking, RV and Survival - Insulated Barrel Stove Kit with Silicone Handles – Military Green
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 31 mins
features: Go-To Option for Outdoor Adventures: The GasOne portable camping stove wood burning is a simple and safe way to enjoy your own portable outdoor stove! This accessory is a must-have for all adventurers who love backpacking, hiking, or those who have an RV.

Versatile Use: What makes our rocket stove for cooking stand out is that it can be used with multiple fuel sources, including wood, charcoal, or solid fuels such as biomass. It is very easy to light up the stove and keep it at a constant heat that is ideal for cooking a wide range of foods.
Practical Style: Our survival stove wood burning is compact and lightweight which makes it ideal for traveling. We have used silicone handles that make it easy to grab and move even when hot.

Maximized Efficiency: This wood stove has an insulated design that maximizes efficiency and produces a high output. This means that you can get a hot and steady stove plate for you to cook delicious meals anytime and anywhere.

Made to Last: Our multi fuel camp stove is made of heavy-duty metal and features a cast iron top that will pass the test of time. This item is extremely durable and reliable, as well as sturdy and secured when placed on a flat surface.
body.description: Gas One is a well-established brand that focuses on developing innovative products that make your life better. For that, we rely on premium manufacturing technologies that allow us to make sure every single one of our products checks the highest quality requirements in the industry. Our survival cooking stove is a state-of-the-art product that should be part of any adventurer’s traveling kit. The wood camp stove portable is a quick and easy way to prepare your favorite meals even when camping or hiking. What makes this product special? Our camping wood burning stove is made of heavy-duty materials that will pass the test of time. The wood burning stove camping can be fueled with different types of sources, including wood, charcoal, and solid fuels. The silicone handles make it easy to carry even right after the fire is out so you can place it in a safe place overnight. Some features to keep in mind about our product: • Color: military green • Made of metal and cast iron top • Secure and sturdy design • Can be used with multiple fuel sources • Built-in silicone handles • Insulated design • Ensures maximum efficiency and high output • Excellent item for camping, hiking, RV, and survival • Lightweight and compact design • Easy to transport • Ideal for preparing delicious food anywhere Enjoy your outdoor adventures even more with our excellent camping stove!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wood stove

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ideal for car camping
reviews.reviewText: I find the ecozoom versa and its clones like this product to be a little mis-marketed: the true niche is camping, specifically car camping. I cooked for 3 days using just this stove, no jetboil, did not use my BioLite camp stove, didn't cook over the campfire at all. This thing is very simple and very robust and produces an enormous amount of heat. I kept 4 liters of water at a rolling boil in a wide pot with the lid off. Only major challenge is dealing with the hotspot in the middle of the pan, but a cheap stainless steel heat diffuser has really helped with that.TLDR: a great piece of camping kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a well built unit, solid and with a clay liner. I'm happy to have it for those times when the power is out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! Don't wait, buy it!
reviews.reviewText: This is simply the best little well made stove and I have many!If you don't always want to carry a fuel source this one is the stove to get for outdoor or emergency cooking and warmth.Pair with rothco Nomad Canvas Duffle Backpack 38L, sea bag or parachute bag and it's simply perfect.Oh and don't forget a winco fish spatula then enjoy the fun of cooking out of doors!Not sized like its bigger sibling the sea bag but built with same quality.Wicked perfect bag for carrying Gas One survival stove and of course any other gear for your fun in the forest days!Find rothco nomad bag herehttps://www.amazon.com/Rothco-Canvas-Duffle-Backpack-Duffel/dp/B0C7SHR74X/ref=pd_ybh_a_sccl_2/132-1598177-3851523?pd_rd_w=XoZAU&content-id=amzn1.sym.67f8cf21-ade4-4299-b433-69e404eeecf1&pf_rd_p=67f8cf21-ade4-4299-b433-69e404eeecf1&pf_rd_r=XF2Z5A17D62GM7BKS3EW&pd_rd_wg=p34Q3&pd_rd_r=1100c7f6-d2c6-4a1e-bb01-578ae08b33e4&pd_rd_i=B0C7SHR74X&th=1add winco fish spatula herehttps://www.amazon.com/Winco-Medium-Stainless-Steel-Brown/dp/B003HEOLXI/ref=sr_1_3?crid=2FOHIZK23HQYR&keywords=winco+fish+spatula&qid=1702247312&sprefix=winco+fish%2Caps%2C106&sr=8-3

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad, not spectacular!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. First burn on the stove started quite easily. It really does take almost constant tending to keep a good fire going. It may be the type of wood, but there's a lot of ash. Probably wouldn't be good with an open cooking container. All in all, it got a large pot of coffee boiling, albeit longer than I expected. I would still recommend value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was really impressed with the build quality. Would buy again. The unit is insulated with a ceramic or mineral wool insulation. There was some residue of the insulation on and in the unit which I would recommend cleaning off (2 minute job). I would also recommend NOT leaving the stove out in the rain (or submerging it in water) which would saturate the insulation between the metal layers of the stove.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars If only it didnt arrive damaged
reviews.reviewText: It appears to be sturdy. HOWEVER...it arrived damaged. There was no damage to the shipping box so the best I can think of was that it happened in the factory. Amazon wouldn't let me return it and deferred me to the manufacturer. Emailed a few times. Got a couple of responses and now they've been radio silent. Haven't tested the stove yet because I want to replace it so I have no say on how effective it is as a stove. Will update if I get a response.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it takes very little fuel
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a grid down and truck camping situation. It doesn't take much fuel and it gets hot fast but outside stays cool. Bought one for myself and gave one as a gift.
Excelente calidad, se ve que esta fabricado con muy buenos materiales, se ve muy solido, dandole un cuidado adecuado y no quemando troncos muy gruesos, va durar muchos años, lo recomiendo ampliamente
